title: Dat Moment when....
body: ... You wait a year for the only time of joy in your life and rito spits on it. Draven? oh joy ...... really... happy days i just waited an entire year only to hear they are going to put URF on a rotating game mode of 3 days at a fkn time. I work weekends... I'm sorry but Im so fkn Angry. (Did I mention they are mocking Australians with their Champion name changes... what is the point?)

replies.body: mocking? lmao if u find that mocking you arent truly an australian. sounds like you need a "safe space" m8
It's for kiwis too broo... step aside.

If you don't know what HUMOR means, then gtfo, no offense.
And that champion name change pack is pretty dope, I can't imagine why wouldn't you like it.
Yeh but they are just going to Force it down our throats like with this draven crap.
Mocking OCE? Only if you're a tight ass nun with no sense of humor.
Mate, they've been mocking OCE since we got a server. Get over it.
